10101000100001.name: BASIC_IDENTITY
10101000100001.description: Combination of name, gender and birth date, hashed.

10101000100002.name: CONTACT_ADDRESS
10101000100002.description: Combination of residence, email, phone, hashed.

10101000100003.name: SOVEREIGN_IDENTITY
10101000100003.description: Combination of ID number, TIN, hashed.

10101000100004.name: POLITICALLY_EXPOSED
10101000100004.description: Investor is politically exposed, data is PEP type.

10101000200001.name: INSTITUTION_INFORMATION
10101000200001.description: Concatenation of company name and type, hashed.

10101000200002.name: INSTITUTION_DETAILS
10101000200002.description: Concatenation of incorporation date, sector and form, hashed.

10101000200003.name: LEGAL_IDENTIFICATION
10101000200003.description: Concatenation of registration number, VAT, LEI, hashed.

10101000200004.name: INSTITUTIONAL_ROLE
10101000200004.description: Role of identity owner investor in the institution (if relevant).

10101000300003.name: AML_STATUS
10101000300003.description: AML status first, then reason in clear, and details hashed.

1010101.name: SPECIFIC_KYC_STATUS
1010101.description: Details required by offering for the KYC status, hashed.

1010102.name: SPECIFIC_ACCREDITATION
1010102.description: Investor is accredited by issuer, or status is irrelevant.
